description: The trap is generated when a user fails to authentication.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-SSH-MIB::hpnicfSSHUserAuthFailure HPN-ICF-SSH-MIB::hpnicfSSHAttemptUserName s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-SSH-MIB::hpnicfSSHAttemptIpAddrType i 0 HPN-ICF-SSH-MIB::hpnicfSSHAttemptIpAddr s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-SSH-MIB::hpnicfSSHUserAuthFailureReason i 1

description: The user name of the attacker who attempted to log in.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-SSH-MIB::hpnicfSSHAttemptUserName

description: The IP address type of the attacker who attempted to log in.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-SSH-MIB::hpnicfSSHAttemptIpAddrType

description: The IP address of the attacker who attempted to log in.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-SSH-MIB::hpnicfSSHAttemptIpAddr

description: The reason for that a user failed to log in.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-SSH-MIB::hpnicfSSHUserAuthFailureReason

description: The trap is generated when a user fails to negotiate SSH
The IP address type of the attacker who attempted to log in.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-SSH-MIB::hpnicfSSHAttemptIpAddrType

description: The IP address of the attacker who attempted to log in.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-SSH-MIB::hpnicfSSHAttemptIpAddr

description: The trap is generated when a user logs in successfully.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-SSH-MIB::hpnicfSSHUserLogin HPN-ICF-SSH-MIB::hpnicfSSHSessionUserName s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-SSH-MIB::hpnicfSSHSessionUserIpAddrType i 0 HPN-ICF-SSH-MIB::hpnicfSSHSessionUserIpAddr s EXAMPLE

description: The user name of SSH session.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-SSH-MIB::hpnicfSSHSessionUserName

description: The user IP address type of SSH session.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-SSH-MIB::hpnicfSSHSessionUserIpAddrType

description: The user IP address of SSH session.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-SSH-MIB::hpnicfSSHSessionUserIpAddr

description: The trap is generated when a user logs off.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-SSH-MIB::hpnicfSSHUserLogoff HPN-ICF-SSH-MIB::hpnicfSSHSessionUserName s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-SSH-MIB::hpnicfSSHSessionUserIpAddrType i 0 HPN-ICF-SSH-MIB::hpnicfSSHSessionUserIpAddr s EXAMPLE

description: The user name of SSH session.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-SSH-MIB::hpnicfSSHSessionUserName

description: The user IP address type of SSH session.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-SSH-MIB::hpnicfSSHSessionUserIpAddrType

description: The user IP address of SSH session.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-SSH-MIB::hpnicfSSHSessionUserIpAddr
